CustomField.formula: IMAGE(SUBSTITUTE('https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?chs=120x120&cht=qr&chl=', '&', '&')&LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_580, FIND('/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_580))&'lightning/n/QR_Code_Product_Details?c__recordId='&Id,'Scan QR code to open record in mobile.')
CustomField.label: QR Code
